verses.text: \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H4210"\w* Asaph. God presides \w in|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* divine \w assembly|strong="H5712"\w*; \w He|strong="H7130"\w* renders \w judgment|strong="H8199"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* gods:

“\w How|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H7563"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w unjustly|strong="H5766"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w show|strong="H5375"\w* \w partiality|strong="H5375"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*? \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*

\w Defend|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* cause \w of|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w weak|strong="H1800"\w* \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*; uphold \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w rights|strong="H1800"\w* \w of|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w* \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H6041"\w*.

\w Rescue|strong="H5337"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w weak|strong="H1800"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w needy|strong="H1800"\w*; \w save|strong="H5337"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w understand|strong="H3045"\w*; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* wander \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2825"\w*; \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w foundations|strong="H4144"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w shaken|strong="H4131"\w*.

\w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* said, ‘\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* gods; \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Most|strong="H5945"\w* \w High|strong="H5945"\w*.’

\w But|strong="H4191"\w* \w like|strong="H4191"\w* mortals you \w will|strong="H5307"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H8269"\w* \w like|strong="H4191"\w* \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* you \w will|strong="H5307"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*.”

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w*.
